topicTitle: Corey in the role of mod/admin.

posts.postText:
Not that I am going to apply..... But, do you think I'd be a good mod/admin? 

Please state a reason either way. 

I'm just wondering if you guys think I'd be a bad one or a good one.

you also start drama with crisis  a lot 


i love you but that clearly showed you were not mature for an admin position


edit: fixed a few words there

Well received but it's not fair to bring up an isolated incident for a situation like this. Plus. That was really not the big of a deal. I didnt really start it either. I posted a ban request and simply defended myself. But I understand what you mean.

Edit: what I meant by not fair is because every one makes a few mistakes. That one incident happened to involve me. I won't say I didn't have any fault. But it's not fair to say I'm immature because of one thing.

>> you also start drama with crisis a lot


i love you but that clearly showed you were not mature for an admin position 
/agree

Edit: I forgot, the applications are open for JAIL. Not TTT. So, even if, we have enough mods/admins on TTT.
Like I said. Not going to apply.
Not to make this about me but....... what would you think of me in the role of a mod/admin as well :D?

>> Not to make this about me but....... what would you think of me in the role of a mod/admin as well :D? 
I think you could make a great mod, if chosen. Good player, follows the rules well, and could enforce them well.


As for Corey, I think you could make a good choice, if you didn't start drama with Crisis.

>> Not that I am going to apply..... But, do you think I'd be a good mod/admin? 

Please state a reason either way. 

I'm just wondering if you guys think I'd be a bad one or a good one. 
If you could settle the beef. You would be good.

In my honest opinion me and crisis are at a level headed manner right now. And have been for a few weeks. And neither of us started drama. It was a bad situation that two butting heads were bound to have. I apologize for it and hope we can move on.
